meanings.definition: Behavior: the way in which one acts or conducts oneself
meanings.sent1: Her haviors at the party were polite and friendly.
meanings.sent2: The teacher praised the student's good haviors in class.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's playful haviors always bring a smile to our faces.
meanings.sent4: The haviors of the waves crashing against the shore were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: His haviors during the interview left a lasting impression on the panel.

meanings.sent1: The child's constant misbehaviors in school worried the parents.
meanings.sent2: The principal addressed the student's misbehavior in a meeting.
meanings.sent3: Despite his misbehavior, he always had a twinkle in his eye.
meanings.sent4: The misbehaviors of the characters added humor to the play.
meanings.sent5: Her misbehavior at the party caused quite a stir among the guests.

meanings.definition: Behavioral: relating to behavior or actions
meanings.sent1: The psychologist studied the behavioral patterns of the patients.
meanings.sent2: The behavioral changes in the patient were noted by the doctor.
meanings.sent3: The behavioral training for the puppies was a fun experience.
meanings.sent4: His behavioral response to stress was to take deep breaths.
meanings.sent5: The behavioral therapy sessions helped improve his interactions with others.
